Here at Princeton ACM,
we are zealous  programmers. theoreticians. learners. problem solvers. competitors. collaborators. teachers.
We are Princeton's premier student organization dedicated to fostering computer science-related interests of any aspiring engineers, academics, analysts, and more.

Featured Announcements

  • October 22, 2021

    Database Talk with Yugabyte

    Join us next Friday (October 29th) for a virtual talk with Yugabyte, who's on a mission to build the default database for cloud-native applications! Read more about the talk and their mission here (ft. boba and job openings!).

  • October 18, 2021

    COSCON is coming back in November!

    ACM's biggest event of the year will be back on November 6th, 2021! Stake your claim in a prize stash worth $15K! Register ASAP to get free boba, check out the website, and read more here!

  • October 5, 2021

    Announcing ACM's Mock Tech Interviews!

    Currently recruiting for tech positions? Are you looking for in-person practice for technical interviews or just some advice on the recruiting process? Sign up and read more here about our interview prep program!
